mdRecord.dcterms:title: Memorial tablet to William Holding Echols,
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Inscription: William Holding Echols 1859-1934, Professor of Mathematics, lived in this pavilion. [work]

By precept and example he taught many generations of students with ruthless insistence that the supreme values are self respect, integrity of mind, contempt of fear and and hatred of sham. The Eli Banana Order by this tablet, honours Reddy Echols and his unique place in the history of the order. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: James Murray Howard University of Virginia Historic Buildings and Grounds Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Sculpture and Installations
memorials
plaques (flat objects)
Echols, William H. (William Holding) (American university professor, 1859-1934)
